title: Next.js Image Optimization in the Real World
summary: Not a docs rehash—practical patterns for `next/image`: CDNs, aggressive caching, and avoiding layout shifts.

body.raw:
- Use `fill` + intrinsic aspect ratios for cards and grids
- Pre-size hero images; don’t lazy-load above the fold
- Cache at CDN with 1d TTL; purge on publish
- For CMS origins, proxy via Edge to normalize headers
